question: What is Chandrayana?
option1: Penance for men marrying women of the same gotra
option2: Penance for men marrying women of the same religion
option3: Penance for men marrying women of the same jati
option4: Penance for men marrying women of the same varna
answer: Penance for men marrying women of the same gotra
explanation: During the later vedic period the marriage between persons of the same gotra was forbidden. We also find the mention of the Chandrayana which is a penance for men marrying women of the same gotra.
